intro.title: Precision Fit
intro.description: Measure when hands are warm and at the end of the day. We offer complimentary resizing on sterling bands within 60 days of delivery.

method: Wrap a strip of paper around the widest point of your finger.
Mark the overlap, lay flat, and measure the length in millimetres.
Match the reading with the chart to select your US size.
notes: We recommend sizing up for stacked rings or wide bands over 6 mm.
